extDesc.en: Select a word and do action quickly

TIP_MOVE.en: Drag and move items to change the priority
TIP_MOVE.zh: 你可以拖动以改变优先级

MOD_NOT_FOUND_EXPLAIN.en:
The module {{ current_mod.id }} is not loaded.

If the corresponding extension is installed, please disable and re-enable it.
MOD_NOT_FOUND_EXPLAIN.zh:
模块 {{ current_mod.id }} 没有被载入。

如果已安装对应的浏览器扩展程序，试试看先禁用，然后重新启用它。

TRANSLATOR_DESCRIPT.en: A simple dictionary using Youdao API
TRANSLATOR_DESCRIPT.zh: 一个使用有道词典API实现的词典

TRANSLATOR_DESCRIPT_FULL.en: A dictionary using [Youdao Open API](http://fanyi.youdao.com/openapi?path=data-mode), providing translation from English to Chinese.
TRANSLATOR_DESCRIPT_FULL.zh: 一个使用[有道词典API](http://fanyi.youdao.com/openapi?path=data-mode)实现的词典，能够将选中的英文词汇翻译为中文。
